meanings.definition: A person who harvests or sells oysters.
meanings.sent1: The oysterman collected fresh oysters from the seabed.
meanings.sent2: The local oysterman brought a basket full of oysters to the market.
meanings.sent3: The oysterman joked that he had 'a shucking good time' at work.
meanings.sent4: The oysterman's hands were as quick as a seagull's beak when opening oysters.
meanings.sent5: The salty smell of the ocean clung to the oysterman's clothes after a day's work.

meanings.definition: A man who works in the oyster industry.
meanings.sent1: The oysterman greeted customers at the seafood restaurant with a smile.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, the oysterman would set out on his boat to tend to the oyster beds.
meanings.sent3: The oysterman proudly displayed his collection of pearl-like oysters at the market.
meanings.sent4: The oysterman's dedication to his craft was as deep as the ocean he worked in.
meanings.sent5: The oysterman's weathered face told the story of years spent on the oyster boats.

meanings.definition: Someone who specializes in cultivating oysters.
meanings.sent1: The oysterman carefully monitored the growth of the oysters in his farm.
meanings.sent2: With skillful hands, the oysterman nurtured the oysters from seed to harvest.
meanings.sent3: The oysterman's oysters were so pampered, they practically had their own spa day.
meanings.sent4: The oysterman's farm was a bustling community of shelled creatures under his care.
meanings.sent5: The oysterman's knowledge of oyster cultivation was as vast as the ocean itself.
